item.description:
The last Friday of each month New England Brewing Company opens its doors to patrons. $10 cover includes 4 free drink tickets and they usually have a band playing. NEB is basically a big garage with kegs, fermenters, and beer cans. It makes good, local beer. The people are pretty cool to talk with. I went for the October event and it was jam packed with tons of people dressed in all kinds of crazy Halloween costumes. No theme this month as far as I know but feel free to dress up like turkey. Gobble, Gobble!

Andrew will be hosting this event.

Text: 508-524-9988

Â
item.name: Final Friday at New England Brewing Company
